summary:
I am a Customer Service and Communications professional with over 20 years experience managing service and administrative teams. I have managed teams in the public and private sectors in a variety of industries, both offline and online.

I have been responsible for providing high quality service and support for esteemed London West End retailers, public sector authorities and web based companies. My responsibilities have included consumer, political and media relations.

I am a native English speaker and my responsibilities have always required a high standard of verbal and written English. My experience includes managing community relations and writing public documents and managing internet/intranet content for Transport for London, The Amsterdam Internet Exchange and retail companies in the UK.

I have excellent IT skills with experience in providing support on Windows and Mac operating systems and I am proficient with MS Office. Throughout my career I have worked in diverse and challenging environments working with complex technical data and the requirement to learn new information quickly and accurately.
